column4: You know what would be awesome? Ubuntu Web Developer Edition. But on that note - does anyone know of ANY linux distribution, livecd or otherwise that is specifically aimed at web development? I've been searching distrowatch for an hour and the best I can find is the rails livecd, and their website doesn't even work
most linux distros can do anything, you just have to install the right packages
but what whould make ubuntu a web developer edition?
I agree it would be awesome to have a "livecd" builder to select packages or set of them, so that you can download something only with what you want
